code.description: Response error code. CCF error codes: https://microsoft.github.io/CCF/main/operations/troubleshooting.html#error-codes

member_cose_sign1.description: Request payload must be a COSE Sign1 document, with expected protected headers. Signer must be a member identity registered with this service.

member_signature.description: Request must be signed according to the HTTP Signature scheme. The signer must be a member identity registered with this service.

always.description: If this request is made to a backup node, it will be forwarded to the primary node for execution.

never.description: This call will never be forwarded, and is always executed on the receiving node, potentially breaking session consistency. If this attempts to write on a backup, this will fail.

sometimes.description: If this request is made to a backup node, it may be forwarded to the primary node for execution. Specifically, if this request is sent as part of a session which was already forwarded, then it will also be forwarded.

info.description: This API is used to submit and query proposals which affect CCF's public governance tables.
info.title: CCF Governance API
